==Trivia==
*Klee's normal and Charged Attacks count as heavy attacks, similar to claymores. As a result, she deals bonus damage to Geo constructs, mineral deposits, and shatter Frozen enemies (alongside the Pyro debuff melting them instantly anyway). Does not apply to her plunging attack.
